#define BM_CD_LAYER_ID   "__mirror_index"

Definition at line 1011 of file editmesh_utils.c.

Referenced by EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin().

#define BM_SEARCH_MAXDIST_MIRR   0.00002f

[note: I've decided to use ideasman's code for non-editmode stuff, but since it has a big "not for editmode!" disclaimer, I'm going to keep what I have here

  • joeedh]

x-mirror editing api. usage:

EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin(em); ... ... BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) { mirrorv = EDBM_verts_mirror_get(em, v); } ... ... EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_end(em);

Note:
why do we only allow x axis mirror editing?

Definition at line 1010 of file editmesh_utils.c.

Referenced by EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin().
